description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Come and Get Me]

Until your rage ends, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard], and damage rolls against you gain a +2 circumstance bonus. If a creature hits you, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] to you until the end of your next turn. If you hit it before the end of your next turn, you gain temporary @Damage[(@actor.level)[healing]]{Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier}, or @Damage[(2*(@actor.level))[healing]]{double} that on a critical hit. These temporary Hit Points last until the end of your rage.
